attributes.review: this app is HORRIBLE,, once it finished downloading it would force quit everytime i opened it. not only that but it was deleting apps, pics, messages and other info off my phone ??!! im no genius but i dont think apps are supposed to do that, pls save urself and dont download
attributes.title: dont download !!!!

attributes.review: Worst app I ever used. Slow interface. Quits by itself all the time. Ads about staying a the trump hotel while I’m just trying to get informed. Overall worst than a four hour zoom lecture where the professor ask to see the while class.
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: I thought I could at least see something good in Trump while being a person of color. So when I downloaded the app a lot of Unknown Senders was messaging me about my body parts.I was pretty freaked out at first. So please don’t buy the app while being a female
attributes.title: The worst

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and right after I was kidnapped and taken to trump tower I was so scared and had no idea what to to they knocked me out I woke up strapped to a bed next trump walked into the room and raped me I am currently locked in his closet I am able to type a review because I found an old phone in here... so yeah bewear
attributes.title: Help

attributes.review: I want to give ZERO STARS. It took 3 months, 2 weeks, and 6 days to download. It then hacked me and deleted ALL MY APPS. When u tried to complain, someone wrote me a strongly worded letter 😤. I then got my credit info stolen online and someone bought one banana, 5 headphones, a rug, 7 dresses, and one real human hand 😡. WORST. APP. EVER.
attributes.title: Wish it didn’t EXIST

attributes.review: I downloaded the app because everyone said that I should, but when I downloaded it and opened the app... My phone got wiped from everything😤😢. I want an apology as soon as possible. I was saving yoongi hand pics and ab pics. Now I have to start from the beginning😤🤧👁👄👁
attributes.title: MY POOR PHONE🤧😤🙃

attributes.review: So weird. I was sitting in bed when I first downloaded this app and my internal organs started to burst and violently bleed. My dad brought up the buckets we use to wash cars and we started filling them up so one day I could hopefully drink all the blood and regain my natural state. Anyway this app kinda stinky thooooo uwu 🤰🏻🐀🐀🐀🐀🐀🐀🐀🐀🐀🏑💕🛒
attributes.title: Blood everywhere

attributes.review: omg this app is horrible. as soon as i got it all my apps were HACKED. i was just trying to support or WONDERFUL president. i had such high hopes for this app but it also completely crashed my phone. needless to say i will have to let everyone i know to not get this app. it’s horrid. i’m completely mortified.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: The app’s set is just awful and I don’t see why they would make the app so terrible!! Not to mention how LONG it took to download, so after the terrible wait, I open to a confusing, hard to navigate, terrible app!
attributes.title: Terrible App!!!! I wish I could leave 0 stars!!!

attributes.review: I recently installed this app to get a better view of Trump, turns out this app is a waist of time and should be deleted, this is a waste of phone storage, please take it down, people are waisting their time on this orange wrinkled swine, please remove it and don’t vote for trump again🤡
attributes.title: Horrible, take it down
